participant_1.background:
I spent my last birthday with my wife at a fancy restaurant, which was nice, but I would rather have gone to the Galapagos Islands again.
I remember dancing to the music of Katy Perry in my room when I was younger.
My favorite websites include scuba diving blogs and movie review sites.
i own a custom upholstery shop.
it is my universe , and everyone else is just a character in it.

participant_2.background:
I have never been arrested, and I am proud of my clean record.
i m a vegetarian.
i prefer the simpler times.
I treasure my collection of little figurines, which I have been collecting for many years.
I'm a clumsy blonde, but my dog loves me anyway.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there!
How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing great! Just finished up a long day of work.
I'm sure it was worth it! What do you do for work?
I own my own custom upholstery shop.
That's really cool! I've always been interested in interior design.
Me too! It's so much fun to be able to create something that's both functional and beautiful.
I agree! I love finding ways to make my home more cozy and inviting.
What's your favorite thing about your home?
I love my collection of little figurines. I've been collecting them for many years and they're one of my most prized possessions.
That's really neat! I love collecting things too. I have a huge collection of movie posters.
Oh wow! That sounds awesome! I bet it's really cool to see them all together.
It is! It's like a little piece of my favorite movies all in one place.
That's awesome! I love that you have something that makes you so happy.
Thanks! It's definitely one of my favorite things.
Well it sounds like you have a great job and a great home! I'm sure you're very happy.
Thanks! I am very happy. I'm lucky to have a lot of great things in my life.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm sure you deserve it.
